name: Sakura Fall Poring Box
description: An fancy box with the scent of early spring and markings of sakuras on it. Rumor has it that it was dug out of the root of an ancient tree!

name: Sakura Guardian Gashapon
description: A Gashapon toy to express personal feelings, open it to randomly receive one headwear of March 2018 [Sakura Guardian] series.

name: Sakura Pie
description: Special food in Sakura City, the local custom is that only newlyweds can eat this. AGI ＋10, Attack Spd ＋20%, the effect lasts 29 minutes.

name: Sakura Puppet
description: Kingdom of Heavenly Water has a beautiful legend, a kind spirit of sakura fell in love with an ordinary human boy. In order to cure the disease of the boy, the spirit of Sakura conveys his spiritual power to the boy and saves his life, but he loses all the psychic power and becomes a falling sakura and goes with the wind. The poor boy could only make a doll of the spirit of cherry according to his own memory. Since then, kingdom of Heavenly Water has a lovely doll, but also has a sad love story.
effect: Auto Attack applies slight bleeding status to self,Bleeding status grants (BaseLv*3) Normal Atk

name: Sakura Season
description: A wizard music record. With it, You can order songs in the music box spot newly designed by Kafra. [Listening to the melody, the image of the far East seems to appear in sight.]

name: Sakura Wedding Blueprints
description: Headdress specially produced in Sakura City that only married couples can wear. This is an accessory that has been blessed by 8 million gods.

name: SAKURA·SAKURA
description: The scattered petals, Like the lingering thoughts, Swings in the spring breeze in April. Valuable things always vanish quickly, please seize the time.

name: Sandals
description: Shoes that are easy to wear, with little defense.

name: Sandals [1]
description: Shoes that are easy to wear, with little defense.

name: Sandstorm [1]
description: Knives made by the Assassin Union.
effect: Hit ＋40,auto attack has a chance to cause the target loses Attack Spd for a while

name: Sandstorm [2]
description: The assassin union's Knife for its outstanding members.
effect: Hit ＋40,auto attack has a chance to cause the target loses Attack Spd for a while

name: Santa Hat
description: Love happens in the snow season of RO, and the beautiful Christmas season. It's a memorial.

name: Santa Hat Blueprint
description: Love happens in the snow season of RO, and the beautiful Christmas season. It's a memorial.
